**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 39 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 [Convergent Giant Eagle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2136) **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 13 **Perception** +29; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36); (can't speak any language); convergent link **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28 **Str** +6 **Dex** +8 **Con** +3 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Convergent Link** Creatures with this ability can communicate with each other by manifesting an aura of wispy [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36) runes. This has the effects of [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) with a range of 300 feet, but requires line of sight. --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +27 **Will** +21 **HP** 290 **Weaknesses** chaotic 10 **Disrupted Link** While a convergent giant eagle is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14), or [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), it loses its convergent link and convergent tactics abilities.
**Evasion** When a giant eagle succeeds at a Reflex save, it critically succeeds instead. --- **Speed** 10 feet, fly 60 feet **Melee** beak +30, **Damage** 4d8+6 piercing plus convergent tactics **Melee** talons +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d10+6 slashing plus convergent tactics and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Eagle Dive** The giant eagle [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) up to double its fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talons Strike. **Convergent Tactics** The convergent eagle's attacks deal an extra 4d8 damage to creatures within reach of one of its allies with convergent tactics. **Snatch** A convergent eagle can [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) at half speed while it has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in its talons, carrying that creature along with it.
name: Convergent Giant Eagle
